Class Battle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Battle

  • public class Battle
extends java.lang.Object
    Battle.java This class handles all the battle related logics that is needed in PokemonArena game. This class is designed in the logic of (start -- running -- end).
    Author:
    Charles-Jianye Chen

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Battle.ACTION
      The enum for the battle actions in the game.
      static class  Battle.nextRoundr
      The enum for the results of nextRound.

    • Method Detail

      • randomBoolean

        public static boolean randomBoolean()
        Randomly select a boolean value. The chance is 50:50.
        Returns:
        a random boolean

      • winner

        public boolean winner()
        Fetch the winner of this battle. The value would be valid only if Battle.end is called.
        Returns:
        the boolean repr of the winner
        See Also:
        ATTACKER, DEFENSER

      • nextRound

        public Battle.nextRoundr nextRound(Battle.ACTION action,
                                   java.lang.String param)
        The function handles the logics of the battle-ing process.

        It determines who's round it is, and performs the action specified by the ACTION.

        ACTION.ATTACK, atkindx(attack)

        ACTION.RETREAT, pokemon's indx

        ACTION.PASS, reserved

        After each round each Pokemon recovers 10 energy, to a maximum of 50.

        Parameters:
        action - indicates the actions is going to perform.
        param - action-specific parameter.
        Returns:
        nextRoundr
        See Also:
        Battle.nextRoundr
